name: Matthew Wills
bio: ﻿﻿Poet Matthew Wills earned a BA from Clark University, an MS in library science from the Pratt Institute, and an MA in film studies from the University of Iowa. An amateur naturalist, he lives in Brooklyn, New York City, where he writes a blog, Backyard and Beyond, about nature in the city. His poems have been published in Asphodel, diode, Hanging Loose magazine, Poetry magazine, and in a New York Times special on urban haiku.
